sent.orig: Destroyer and preserver; hear, oh hear!
sent.trans: 哦，听吧，你既在毁坏，又在保藏！

sent.orig: Oh, I hear. You needn't shout. The whole castle can hear.
sent.trans: 嗳，听见了，你用不着叫嚷，全城堡都听得见。

sent.orig: You may still hear the VRC locally, but the other end will not hear it.
sent.trans: 你在当地仍能听见VCR,但另一头的人听不见。

sent.orig: Can you hear me, can you hear me, thru' the dark night far away?
sent.trans: 你听得见我吗？你听得见我吗？穿越黑夜，在遥远的地方。

sent.orig: All 7 churches common statement He who has ears to hear let them hear.
sent.trans: 对七间教会说同样的话：凡有耳的就应当听。
